value:
$WmMPID_比翼ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|Hah! Take this!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Ah! Cold... Why did you need to
splash me, Ymir? Now I have to
get you back...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Hahaha! You're right, it's freezing!
Isn't it funny how the ocean can sit in
the sun all day and still remain cool?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|If it didn't, the fish would all die.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Of course. That is true.$k$pJust as the rodents underground
would not be able to live if the sun
shone in their burrows.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Whether in the forest or the sea,
most creatures can only thrive in
their natural habitats.$k$pI have learned a great deal from
observing the outdoors...$k$pMore than I ever could have hoped
to learn by staying holed up inside.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|I suppose we owe our thanks to
$Nu, don't we?$k$pI'm so grateful that the summoner's
invitation has allowed me to see you
experience all of these new things.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Indeed. But I'm grateful to you as
well, Ymir.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Oh? What for?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|When I was the princess of death,
I was convinced that I would always
be hated and shunned by everyone.$k$pYet here you are, relaxing and having
fun...even though you are with me.$k$pKnowing someone like you can spend
time with me, and truly enjoy it...$k$pIt makes me happy, truly happy,
in a way I never thought I could be.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|You're not a princess of death
anymore, Eir. You're queen of
the realm of life.$k$pYou bestow the light and joy of life
upon all of humanity!$k$pAnd the path ahead for you is bright,
surrounded by friends and loved
ones. That includes me, of course.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|I'm glad.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Now, I'd say we've had our fill of fun
for the time being. Let's rest awhile,
shall we?$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|All right. Let's sit down in the shade
of those trees over there.$k$p$Sbs7000|Ah... Why is it...so dark?$k$p$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|Mother?!$k$pWhat's...happening?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Eir! Are you all right?!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|An illusion?$k$pSorry to worry you. I'm fine. I just got
a little disoriented for a moment as
we stepped into the shade...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Oh! Yes, I think I know what you
mean. Entering the shade can make
everything around you seem dark.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Yes... When the light is strong, the
shadows cast by it are also darker
and deeper...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Eir, are you sure you're all right?
You seem less disoriented and
more...unsettled.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|It's nothing. I'll be fine.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|Oh, hello, Ymir. And...Princess Eir?
Is something wrong? You're pale
as a ghost.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you for your concern, Princess
Fjorm. Just a bit too much sun.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|You too? Reluctant as I am to admit
it, my upbringing did not prepare me
for this much sunshine.$k$pWhy don't we take a break together?
There's a wonderful breeze here.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|That sounds lovely, Princess Fjorm!
Thank you!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you again for your kindness,
Princess Fjorm. I am feeling much
better now, so I'll be on my way.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Swim23,Face|I'm glad to hear that. Take care.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_44_Ymir_FF_Pair,Face|I will.$k$p$Sbs150|
